snippet: “Mr. Peale’s creed, ‘believe in yourself,’ is a recipe for narcissistic and egotistic behavior,” a reader writes....
lead_paragraph: “Mr. Peale’s creed, ‘believe in yourself,’ is a recipe for narcissistic and egotistic behavior,” a reader writes.

headline.print_headline: Norman Vincent Peale’s Influence on Trump
